title: exp/winfsnotify: data race in test
body:
Revision 14791. Experimental windows race detector says:

WARNING: DATA RACE
Read by goroutine 6:
  exp/winfsnotify.TestNotifyClose()
      src/pkg/exp/winfsnotify/winfsnotify_test.go:115 +0xfd
  testing.tRunner()
      src/pkg/testing/testing.go:301 +0x92

Previous write by goroutine 8:
  exp/winfsnotify.funcÂ·003()
      src/pkg/exp/winfsnotify/winfsnotify_test.go:111 +0x55

Goroutine 6 (running) created at:
  testing.RunTests()
      src/pkg/testing/testing.go:377 +0xafb
  testing.Main()
      src/pkg/testing/testing.go:313 +0xd0
  main.main()
      C:/Users/DVU/AppData/Local/Temp/go-build986273583/exp/winfsnotify/_test/_testmain.go:45 +0xdd
  runtime.main()
      src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:248 +0x94

Goroutine 8 (finished) created at:
  exp/winfsnotify.TestNotifyClose()
      src/pkg/exp/winfsnotify/winfsnotify_test.go:112 +0xdd
  testing.tRunner()
